reviewText: It's a real stretch referring to most of these films as cult classics. What you get in this combo set is a selection of older films that seem to be included in every cheap combo set on the market. Films like the 1960s Little Shop of Horrors, Night of the Living Dead, Carnival of Souls and the Vincent Price version of House on Haunted Hill. If you enjoy films like this (I certainly do) then by all means, grab a copy of this collection. But if you already have a dozen copies of these films as part of other movie sets you may want to give it a pass.
My husband is enjoying these classics
The price is great for these classic horror films!

Some favorites are in here. On the whole, pretty good.

This isn't really a review. I just feel that Amazon doesn't give enough information about this DVD collection. I'm adding this so any potential buyer might to be able to make an informed purchasing decision. I hope it's useful.

White Zombie (1932) - 69 min - Horror - Director: Victor Halperin - Stars: Bela Lugosi, Madge Bellamy and Joseph Cawthorn.

The Devil Bat (1940) - 68 min - Horror / Sci-Fi - Director: Jean Yarbrough - Stars: Bela Lugosi, Suzanne Kaaren and Dave O'Brien.

The Bat (1959) - 80 min - Horror / Thriller / Mystery - Director: Crane Wilbur - Stars: Vincent Price, Agnes Moorehead and Gavin Gordon.

The Last Man on Earth (1964) - 86 min - Action / Drama / Horror - Directors: Ubaldo Ragona, and Sidney Salkow - Stars: Vincent Price, Franca Bettoia and Emma Danieli.

House on Haunted Hill (1959) - 75 min - Drama / Horror / Thriller - Director: William Castle - Stars: Vincent Price, Carol Ohmart and Richard Long.

Maniac (1934) - 51 min - Horror / Thriller - Director: Dwain Esper - Stars: William Woods, Horace B. Carpenter and Ted Edwards.

Piranha (1972) - 90 min - Thriller / Drama - Director: William Gibson - Stars: William Smith, Peter Brown and Ahna Capri.

The Little Shop of Horrors (1960) - 72 min - Comedy / Fantasy / Horror - Director: Roger Corman - Stars: Jonathan Haze, Jackie Joseph and Mel Welles.

Night of the Living Dead (1968) - 96 min - Horror / Sci-Fi - Director: George A. Romero - Stars: Duane Jones, Judith O'Dea and Karl Hardman.

Carnival of Souls (1962) - 78 min - Horror / Thriller - Director: Herk Harvey - Stars: Candace Hilligoss, Frances Feist and Sidney Berger.

Lady Frankenstein (1971) - 85 min - Horror / Sci-Fi - Director: Mel Welles - Stars: Joseph Cotten, Rosalba Neri and Paul Muller.

Dead Men Walk (1943) - 64 min - Drama / Horror / Mystery - Director: Sam Newfield - Stars: George Zucco, Mary Carlisle and Dwight Frye.

The Satanic Rites of Dracula a.k.a. Count Dracula and His Vampire Bride (1973) - 87 min - Horror - Director: Alan Gibson - Stars: Christopher Lee, Peter Cushing and Michael Coles.

The Terror (1963) - 81 min - Horror - Director: Roger Corman - Stars: Boris Karloff, Jack Nicholson and Sandra Knight.

Silent Night, Bloody Night a.k.a. Night of the Dark Full Moon (1974) - 88 min -  Horror / Mystery / Thriller - Director: Theodore Gershuny - Stars: Patrick O'Neal, James Patterson and Mary Woronov.
